channel.title: CVE Feed for David de Boer -- Paytium: Mollie payment forms & donations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for David de Boer -- Paytium: Mollie payment forms & donations

item.title: CVE-2024-25099|2024-03-13T16:02:20.549Z -- david%20de%20boer -- paytium%3A%20mollie%20payment%20forms%20%26%20donations
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in David de Boer Paytium: Mollie payment forms & donations allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Paytium: Mollie payment forms & donations: from n/a through 4.4.2.
